permafrost.tundra.io

Class DirectoryHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.io.DirectoryHelper

  • public final class DirectoryHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with file system directories.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DirectoryHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class;

      • list

        public static java.lang.String[] list(java.lang.String directory)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Returns a raw directory listing with no additional processing: useful for when performance takes priority over ease of use; for example, when the directory contains hundreds of thousands or more files.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to list.
        Returns:
        The list of item names in the given directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the directory does not exist.

      • purge

        public static long purge(java.io.File directory,
                         javax.xml.datatype.Duration duration,
                         java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                         boolean recurse)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Deletes all files in the given directory, and child directories if recurse is true, older than the given duration.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to be purged.
        duration - The age files must be before they are deleted.
        filter - An optional FilenameFilter used to filter which files are deleted.
        recurse - If true, then child files and directories will also be recursively purged.
        Returns:
        The number of files deleted.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the directory does not exist.

      • purge

        recurse - If true, then child files and directories will also be recursively purged.
        Returns:
        The number of files deleted.

      • purge

        public static long purge(java.io.File directory,
                         java.util.Calendar olderThan,
                         java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                         boolean recurse)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Deletes all files in the given directory, and child directories if recurse is true, older than the given duration.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to be purged.
        olderThan - Only files modified prior to this datetime will be deleted.
        filter - An optional FilenameFilter used to filter which files are deleted.
        recurse - If true, then child files and directories will also be recursively purged.
        Returns:
        The number of files deleted.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the directory does not exist.

      • zip

        public static java.io.InputStream zip(java.io.File directory,
                                      java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                                      boolean recurse,
                                      boolean includeParentInPath)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses the files in the given directory into a zip archive.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to be compressed.
        filter - An optional filter to determine which files to include in the archive.
        recurse - Whether to also recursively archive subdirectories.
        includeParentInPath - Whether the parent directory should be included in the filename paths.
        Returns:
        An input stream from which the resulting zip archive can be read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

      • zip

        private static void zip(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zipOutputStream,
                        java.util.Deque<java.lang.String> path,
                        java.io.File directory,
                        java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                        boolean recurse)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses the files in the given directory into a zip archive.
        Parameters:
        zipOutputStream - The zip stream to write the directory's contents to.
        path - The path prefix for all file names.
        directory - The directory to compress.
        filter - An optional filter to determine which files to include in the archive.
        recurse - Whether to also recursively archive subdirectories.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

      • tar

        public static java.io.InputStream tar(java.io.File directory,
                                      java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                                      boolean recurse,
                                      boolean includeParentInPath,
                                      boolean gzip)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the files in the given directory to a tar archive.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to be archived.
        filter - An optional filter to determine which files to include in the archive.
        recurse - Whether to also recursively archive subdirectories.
        includeParentInPath - Whether the parent directory should be included in the filename paths.
        gzip - Whether to gzip the resulting tar archive.
        Returns:
        An input stream from which the resulting tar archive can be read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

      • compact

        public static void compact(java.io.File directory,
                           boolean deleteSelf)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes all empty child directories in the given directory, and optionally deletes the given directory itself if empty.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to be compacted.
        deleteSelf - If true the given directory will also be deleted if empty
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the directory could not be deleted.

      • size

        public static java.math.BigInteger size(java.lang.String directory,
                                        boolean recurse)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the total size in bytes of all files in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to calculate the size of.
        recurse - If true, will recursively calculate the size of the entire directory tree including all child directories.
        Returns:
        The total size in bytes of all files in the given directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the given directory does not exist or is a file.

      • size

        public static java.math.BigInteger size(java.io.File directory,
                                        boolean recurse)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the total size in bytes of all files in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to calculate the size of.
        recurse - If true, will recursively calculate the size of the entire directory tree including all child directories.
        Returns:
        The total size in bytes of all files in the given directory.
        Throws:

      • squeeze

        public static java.math.BigInteger squeeze(java.lang.String directory,
                                           java.math.BigInteger allowedSize,
                                           java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                                           boolean recurse)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Reduces the size in bytes of a directory to an allowable size by deleting the least recently used files.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to be squeezed.
        allowedSize - The allowable size of the directory in bytes.
        filter - An optional FilenameFilter used to filter which files are deleted.
        recurse - If true, child directories will be included in the total size and their files may be deleted when reducing the total size of the parent.
        Returns:
        The resulting total size in bytes of all files in the given directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the given directory does not exist or is not a file.

      • squeeze

        public static java.math.BigInteger squeeze(java.io.File directory,
                                           java.math.BigInteger allowedSize,
                                           java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                                           boolean recurse)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Reduces the size in bytes of a directory to an allowable size by deleting the least recently used files.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to be squeezed.
        allowedSize - The allowable size of the directory in bytes.
        filter - An optional FilenameFilter used to filter which files are deleted.
        recurse - If true, child directories will be included in the total size and their files may be deleted when reducing the total size of the parent.
        Returns:
        The resulting total size in bytes of all files in the given directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the given directory does not exist or is not a file.

      • gzip

        public static long gzip(java.io.File directory,
                        java.util.Calendar olderThan,
                        java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                        boolean recurse,
                        boolean replace)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses files in the given directory, and child directories if recurse is true, older than the given duration using gzip.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory whose files are to be compressed.
        olderThan - Only files modified prior to this datetime will be compressed.
        filter - An optional FilenameFilter used to filter which files are compressed.
        recurse - If true, then child files and directories will also be recursively compressed.
        replace - Whether the original file should be deleted once compressed.
        Returns:
        The number of files compressed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.

      • gzip

        public static long gzip(java.io.File directory,
                        javax.xml.datatype.Duration duration,
                        java.io.FilenameFilter filter,
                        boolean recurse,
                        boolean replace)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses files in the given directory, and child directories if recurse is true, older than the given duration using gzip.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory whose files are to be compressed.
        duration - The age files must be before they are deleted.
        filter - An optional FilenameFilter used to filter which files are compressed.
        recurse - If true, then child files and directories will also be recursively compressed.
        replace - Whether the original file should be deleted once compressed.
        Returns:
        The number of files compressed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.
